page.title: 03Weather,Climate contd.
page.content: residents of Hammermill completely lost their spring water supply from mid_December until the following April,as the frost had permeated so far into the soil. Rainfall in the area is average for the North East of England. 1981 1982 1983 1984 1985 Jan 40.2 79.0 34.7 80.6 70.9 Feb 19.5 10.3 44.1 33.4 7.9 Mar 68.6 42.7 45.3 57.3 61.4 Apr 40.8 15.4 107.0 18.9 50.3 May 33.4 26.9 93.5 33.7 50.5 Jun 28.4 82.8 52.2 46.7 37.5 Jul 41.1 45.1 27.1 18.5 66.7 Aug 21.2 52.1 24.6 52.7 98.9 Sep 94.7 37.8 55.9 93.9 55.2 Oct 95.7 91.2 30.6 32.4 Nov 42.4 57.1 25.6 160.9 Dec 47.2 45.9 84.6 34.6 Mm 593.2 586.3 625.2 663.6 Ins 23.3 23.0 24.6 26.1
